about_the_game:
The DLC is free for Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - Duel Expansion.
This expansion pack is mainly to expand the unique image of the generals. Because of the relatively large capacity, it is made as a separate DLC, which players can selectively download.
After installing this DLC, the following generals will have their own unique images when duel.
DLC contains unique image of generals:
Lu Bu
Zhao Yun
Zhang Fei
Zhu Rong
Ma Chao
Sun Ce
Huang Zhong
Guan Yu
Xu Chu
Zhang Liao
Xu Huang
Pound
Gan Ning
Dian Wei
Tai Shi Ci
Sun Jian

The DLC is free for Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - Duel Expansion.
This expansion pack is mainly to expand the unique image of the generals. Because of the relatively large capacity, it is made as a separate DLC, which players can selectively download.
After installing this DLC, the following generals will have their own unique images when duel.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - Duel Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In the last years of the Han Dynasty, the empire was plunged into long-term chaos and turmoil. The warlords fought with each other; bandits run rampant; foreign races disturbed the frontiers; ancient beasts seem to be coming to the world soon...
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
